getRecome.label: 获取热门推荐
getRecome.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,Book,replaceHTML} = context;http.get(baseUrl, {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('https://', ''),'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then(res => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let hotBooks = [];let lis = str.match(/<ul[^>]*class=([

]?)g1-collection-item g1-collection-item-1of3\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if (lis) {lis.forEach(li => {let title = li.match(/title="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1];let emojis = title.match(/&#*([\s\S]*?);/ig);if (emojis) {emojis.forEach(emoji => {title = title.replace(emoji, '')})}let srcstr = '';let cover = '';if (li.match(/data-lazy-srcset="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {srcstr = li.match(/data-lazy-srcset="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].split(', ')} else if (li.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {srcstr = li.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].split(', ')} else {cover = li.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1]}if (srcstr) {let index = srcstr.findIndex(src => src.indexOf('resize') > -1 || src.indexOf('fit') > -1);cover = index > -1 ? srcstr[index] : srcstr[0];if (index > -1) {let fit = cover.match(/resize=*([\s\S]*?)&|fit=*([\s\S]*?)&/);cover = cover.replace(fit[1], '192%2C108');}}hotBooks.push(new Book({bookId: li.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].replace(baseUrl,''),title: title,cover: cover,style: '热门',isEnd: true,isAdult: true,type: 'comic',source: source}))})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {hotBooks: hotBooks,source: source}})}).catch(() => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {source: source}})})})}

search.label: 搜索功能
search.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,Book,replaceHTML,htmlDecodeByRegExp} = context;http.get(baseUrl + '/page/' + params.page[source] + '/', {params: {s: params.keyword},headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('https://', ''),'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then(res => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let list = [];let lis = str.match(/<ul[^>]*class=([

]?)entry-before-title\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);let desc = '';let style = '';if (tags) {tags.forEach((tag, key) => {style = tag.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1];desc += tag.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1] + (key == tags.length - 1 ? '' : ' ');})}let cover = li.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1];let fit = cover.match(/resize=*([\s\S]*?)&|fit=*([\s\S]*?)&/);cover = cover.replace(fit[2], '192%2C108');list.push(new Book({bookId: li.match(/]*class=([

]?)name\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[2],style: style,desc: desc,isAdult: true,isEnd: true,type: 'comic',source: source}))})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: list,isLastPage: list.length < 12,currentPage: params.page[source],source: source}})}).catch(() => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {list: [],isLastPage: true,currentPage: params.page[source],source: source}})})})}

getTypeList.label: 分类列表
getTypeList.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {source} = params;const {ERR_OK} = context;resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: [{label: '全部',value: '/',source: source}],source: source}})})}

getTypeDetail.label: 分类详情
getTypeDetail.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,Book,replaceHTML,htmlDecodeByRegExp} = context;http.get(baseUrl + params.id + 'page/' + params.page + '/', {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then(res => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let list = [];let lis = str.match(/<ul[^>]*class=([

]?)g1-collection-item g1-collection-item-1of3\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if (lis) {lis.forEach(li => {let title = li.match(/title="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1];let emojis = title.match(/&#*([\s\S]*?);/ig);if (emojis) {emojis.forEach(emoji => {title = title.replace(emoji, '')})}let srcstr = '';let cover = '';if (li.match(/data-lazy-srcset="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {srcstr = li.match(/data-lazy-srcset="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].split(', ')} else if (li.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {srcstr = li.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].split(', ')} else {cover = li.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1]}if (srcstr) {let index = srcstr.findIndex(src => src.indexOf('resize') > -1 || src.indexOf('fit') > -1);cover = index > -1 ? srcstr[index] : srcstr[0];if (index > -1) {let fit = cover.match(/resize=*([\s\S]*?)&|fit=*([\s\S]*?)&/);cover = cover.replace(fit[1], '192%2C108');}}list.push(new Book({bookId: li.match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].replace(baseUrl,''),title: title,cover: cover,style: '热门',isEnd: true,isAdult: true,type: 'comic',source: source}))})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {list: list,isLastPage: list.length < 22,currentPage: params.page,source: source}})}).catch(() => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {list: [],isLastPage: true,currentPage: params.page,source: source}})})})}

getDetail.label: 书籍详情
getDetail.value: function (context, params) {return new Promise(resolve => {const {baseUrl,source} = params;const {http,ERR_OK,ERR_FALSE,replaceHTML,getTag,Chapter,Book,} = context;http.get(baseUrl + params.id, {headers: {Referer: baseUrl,Host: baseUrl.replace('https://', ''),'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/78.0.3904.108 Safari/537.36'}}).then((res) => {let str = replaceHTML(res.data);let title = str.match(/<h1[^>]*class=([

]?)entry-before-title\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);let tag = getTag(source, title);let desc = '';let style = '';if (tags) {tags.forEach((ta, key) => {style = ta.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1];tag.push(style);desc += style + (key == tags.length - 1 ? '' : ' ');})}let entag = str.match(/]*class=([

]?)adace-slot-wrapper adace-after-content  adace-slot-wrapper-main\1[^>]*>/)[0].match(/<img[^>]*>/ig);if (imgs) {let content = [];imgs.forEach(img => {let src = '';if (img.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {src = img.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1];} else if (img.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {src = img.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1];} else {src = img.match(/src=*([\s\S]*?)>/)[1];}content.push(src.indexOf('http') == -1 ? baseUrl + src : src);});chapters.push(new Chapter({id: 'asiamodel_' + source,title: '全本' + '（' + content.length + 'P）',chapter: 1,isStart: true,isEnd: true,content: content}))}let guess = [];let sames = [];let uls = str.match(/<ul[^>]*class=([

]?)(g1-collection-items |g1-collection-items)\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if (uls) {uls.forEach((ul, key) => {let lis = ul.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if (lis) {lis.forEach(li => {let subTitle = li.match(/title="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1];let emojis = subTitle.match(/&#*([\s\S]*?);/ig);if (emojis) {emojis.forEach(emoji => {subTitle = subTitle.replace(emoji, '')})}let desc = '';if (key == 0) {let entrys = li.match(/]*class=([

]?)entry-before-title\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/ig);if (entrys) {entrys.forEach((entry, i) => {desc += entry.match(/]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[1] +(i == entrys.length - 1 ? '' : ' ');})}}let srcstr = '';let cover = '';if (li.match(/data-lazy-srcset="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {srcstr = li.match(/data-lazy-srcset="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].split(', ')} else if (li.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)) {srcstr = li.match(/data-lazy-src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].split(', ')} else {cover = li.match(/src="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1]}if (srcstr) {let index = srcstr.findIndex(src => src.indexOf('resize') > -1 || src.indexOf('fit') > -1);cover = index > -1 ? srcstr[index] : srcstr[0];if (index > -1) {let fit = cover.match(/resize=*([\s\S]*?)&|fit=*([\s\S]*?)&/);cover = cover.replace(fit[1], '192%2C108');}}let book = new Book({bookId: li.match(/]*class=([

]?)g1-frame\1[^>]*>*([\s\S]*?)/)[0].match(/href="*([\s\S]*?)"/)[1].replace(baseUrl, ''),title: subTitle,cover: cover,desc: desc,isAdult: true,isEnd: true,type: 'comic',source: source});key == 0 ? guess.push(book) : sames.push(book);})}})}resolve({code: ERR_OK,data: {bookInfo: {tag: tag,desc: desc,style: style,isEnd: true},chapters: chapters,guess: guess,sames: sames,source: source}})}).catch((err) => {resolve({code: ERR_FALSE,data: {bookInfo: {},source: source}})})})}
